a1: I think they have a very good, young squad with a lot of potential
a2: Mbappe is the most promising player, for me at the moment it is still Griezmann
q3: with this young squad they can win the wc again next year?
a3: yes they can win the wc again
q4: HOw will they do in the Europeans?
a4: They are decent enough that they can win
q5: Do you think France is one of the best teams?
a5: I do believe they are the best team in the world at the moment.
